title: Dynamic champion Background isn't updating?
body:
Has anyone else not got their dynamic champion backgrounds not updating?

Mine hasn't updated in like 3 days, and it's stuck on malphite even though i've been playing mostly ornn recently.

replies.body: It's always been a bit hit an miss. My best guess is that it updates over a certain time period, rather than over x number of recent games played with x champion at any given time, so if you switch champs in the middle of that period it'll take a while to change over.

I've had issues with this for, idk, well over a month.

With all the game/reward related issues, I didn't view it as important.
